title: Sharing of the balance FSI : There shall be no sharing of the balance FSI, which shall be entirely available to CIDCO for implementing Affordable Housing Project
clause_text: Sharing of the balance FSI : There shall be no sharing of the balance FSI, which shall be entirely available to CIDCO for implementing Affordable Housing Project.
